description.value: You focus your divine power to extend your influence. Select one aura you have from a champion feat or feature, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Aura of Courage]{Aura of Courage} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Aura of Life]{Aura of Life}. The radius of the aura is doubled until the start of your next turn.

value.value: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
